sentences.sContent: The strain she was under was well camouflaged by skilful make-up.
sentences.sCn: 巧妙的化妆很好地掩盖了她紧张的心情。

remMethod.val: cam(看作came) + ou(看作out) + flag(旗帜) + e → 扛着旗帜出来 → 伪装成革命战士 → 伪装

trans.tranOther: to hide something, especially by making it look the same as the things around it, or by making it seem like something else
a way of hiding something, especially soldiers and military equipment, by using paint, leaves etc to make it look like the things around it
